meaningMnemonic: If you play <radical>music</radical> with your <radical>fins</radical>, one <kanji>rule</kanji> is that you must be a fish. You can’t play music using fish fins that don’t belong to you. That’s the rule. And it’s also rude.
readingMnemonic: There’s also a <kanji>rule</kanji> in place to limit the amount of fish fin musicians. No more than <reading>ten</reading> (てん) are allowed to gather and play their music together. That’s the rule. No more than ten.
